text:
The line in the header of the page in authoring mode, which usually contains
information such as

Workflow State: authoring  |  not live  |  User: torsten  |  Server Time:
2005-3-12 14:48:02 +0100

is not there any more in 1.4 trunk.
creator: tschlabach@apache.org

text:
Hm, this usually happens if the workflow file (for this particular content file)
is missing. Could you check if there is a workflow file under
${publication-id}/content/workflow/history/authoring/...?
creator: egli@apache.org

text:
The workflow history files don't have to be present anymore.

Torsten, could you try it again please?
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Are you using the XUL-Menu?
I think the status info is simply not implemented in the XUL-Menu.
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
